text: Yeah I've played around with it and it seems it's not possible. Strange as associated objects are available as columns in normal objects like contacts

+++++++++++++++++
Hi All,
*Quick Questions:*
I have to custom objects A and B. These are associated with each other as well.
I want to associate object *A* to *Companies*, How to update relation?

Check out this endpoint: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects>

`/crm/v3/schemas/{objectType}/associations`

Object Definitions -> Create an association
Question: is there any way I can watch for changes / updates in templates and pages? (webhooks?) API or integration, just looking for the best
